snippet: Where the Communist Party’s heavy hand is most keenly felt, it is hard to find people who openly support the Hong Kong protesters and their demands.
abstract: Support for Hong Kong's pro-democracy protesters and their demands is hard to find on streets of Beijing, where ruling Communist Party's heavy hand is most keenly felt in the capital.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Ansfield contributed reporting. Chen Jiehao, Kiki Zhao and Jess Macy Yu contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Where the Communist Party’s heavy hand is most keenly felt, it is hard to find people who openly support the Hong Kong protesters and their demands.

headline.main: Support for Protesters Is Hard to Find on the Streets of Beijing
headline.print_headline: Support for Protesters Is Hard to Find on the Streets of Beijing
